page.title: 08Transport _ Belsay district
page.content: The block contains 2 Km of the A696 trunk road Belsay to Otterburn which is single carriageway, also 3 Km of B6524 Belsay to Morpeth, and 3 Km of minor road Belsay to Bolam. Public service buses. National Express run 4 daily services in each direction between Newcastle and Galashields along the A696. Cost to Newcastle Â£1.10 return Â£1.55. Vasey's Coaches run from Otterburn to Newcastle along the A696. There are 4 services on schooldays, 3 on Saturdays,2 on school holidays and none on Sundays. There is a single service once weekly to Morpeth on Fridays. Cars. Few residents live on the bus routes and therefore public transport is rarely used. Only 1 household did not own a car. Nearest garage for petrol and repairs is in Belsay.
